subject: Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The Fastnet, one of the world's traditional offshore challenges, once guaranteed its victors multiple nights at sea and an endurance test, but Mike Slade's new-generation yacht changed all that.
snippet: The Fastnet, one of the world's traditional offshore challenges, once guaranteed its victors multiple nights at sea and an endurance test, but Mike Slade's new-generation yacht changed all that.
